== Plan of the future releases ==

=== Introduction ===

Toshiro-IOC is ready to use in production. There will be some features added in the future in order to make make the project more complete into real world applications.

=== Release plan ===

*0.8* 
  * more ASDocs comments
  * refactored internal structure (compatible with 0.7 release)
  * added puremvc (multicore) support

*0.9*
  * added support to multifile implementation

*1.0*
  * added support for dynamically adding new xml files with object definitions, which will help to integrate into multicore modules
